import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import { Editor } from "@tinymce/tinymce-react"; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; export class CategoryDetails extends Component { state = { startDate: new Date() }; render() { const styles = { image: { height: 70, marginRight: 20 }, }; const product = { title: "Product title", code: " 13t77fvtf4 ", imageUrl: "https://www.pngplay.com/wp-content/uploads/12/Joystick-Transparent-File-Clip-Art.png", price: 77.99, category: "Product category", amount: 245 } const categories_list = () => { let categories = [] for (let i = 0; i < 6; i++) { categories.push( ) } return categories; } const type_list = () => { let types = [] for (let i = 0; i < 6; i++) { types.push( ) } return types; } return ( <>

{product.title}

code: {product.code}

) } } export default CategoryDetails;
